ref: 8362 pŕ̊dāku m. (pr̥dākūˊ -- f. AV.) ʻ snake ʼ RV., pr̥dāku -- m. ʻ tiger, panther ʼ lex. [If with H. W. Bailey BSOAS xi 782 orig. meaning is ʻ spotted ʼ, both may be same word and the latter not necessarily ← Ir. (Psht. pṛāng, &c.): see EWA ii 335 with lit.]
L. parṛā m., ˚ṛī f. ʻ leopard ʼ (< *praḍā -- ). --
